object.name: Giveaway
object.description: This object represents a message about a scheduled giveaway.
object.html_description: This object represents a message about a scheduled giveaway.
object.rst_description: This object represents a message about a scheduled giveaway.

annotations.description: The list of chats which the user must join to participate in the giveaway
annotations.html_description: The list of chats which the user must join to participate in the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: The list of chats which the user must join to participate in the giveaway
annotations.name: chats

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway will be selected
annotations.html_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway will be selected
annotations.rst_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway will be selected
annotations.name: winners_selection_date

annotations.description: The number of users which are supposed to be selected as winners of the giveaway
annotations.html_description: The number of users which are supposed to be selected as winners of the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: The number of users which are supposed to be selected as winners of the giveaway
annotations.name: winner_count

annotations.description: True, if only users who join the chats after the giveaway started should be eligible to win
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if only users who join the chats after the giveaway started should be eligible to win
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if only users who join the chats after the giveaway started should be eligible to win
annotations.name: only_new_members

annotations.description: True, if the list of giveaway winners will be visible to everyone
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the list of giveaway winners will be visible to everyone
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the list of giveaway winners will be visible to everyone
annotations.name: has_public_winners

annotations.description: A list of two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes indicating the countries from which eligible users for the giveaway must come. If empty, then all users can participate in the giveaway. Users with a phone number that was bought on Fragment can always participate in giveaways.
annotations.html_description: Optional. A list of two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes indicating the countries from which eligible users for the giveaway must come. If empty, then all users can participate in the giveaway. Users with a phone number that was bought on Fragment can always participate in giveaways.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. A list of two-letter `ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2>`_ country codes indicating the countries from which eligible users for the giveaway must come. If empty, then all users can participate in the giveaway. Users with a phone number that was bought on Fragment can always participate in giveaways.
annotations.name: country_codes

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars to be split between giveaway winners; for Telegram Star giveaways only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of Telegram Stars to be split between giveaway winners; for Telegram Star giveaways only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of Telegram Stars to be split between giveaway winners; for Telegram Star giveaways only
annotations.name: prize_star_count

annotations.description: The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for; for Telegram Premium giveaways only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for; for Telegram Premium giveaways only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for; for Telegram Premium giveaways only
annotations.name: premium_subscription_month_count
